bug.short_desc: copr repo makes gnome-software/pkcon unable to find software
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
A copr repo can break gnome-software's look for software and make it display almost nothing without showing any error.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): Fedora 25 (upgraded from Fedora 24)
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Add a copr repo like this one : "duffert/qtox-latest" 2. Run gnome-software 3. See there is no software 4. run 'pkcon refresh force' 5. See the error message (Erreur fatale: Status code: 404 for https://copr-be.cloud.fedoraproject.org/results/duffert/qtox-latest/pubkey.gpg ) in french (= fatal error 404 in english) 6. Run 'dnf copr remove duffert/qtox-latest' (in this case) 7. Run 'pkcon refresh force' again 8. See no error 9. Run gnome-software 10. See software
Actual results:
There is no way for the user to guess why gnome-software doesnt find anything
Expected results:
At least throw an error message or skip the broken repo without breaking everything
Additional info:
It happened when upgrading from Fedora 24 to 25 beta
